meanings.definition: The property of certain crystals to generate an electric charge in response to mechanical stress.
meanings.sent1: The piezoelectricities of the crystal were evident when it produced electricity when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are fascinated by the piezoelectricities of these special crystals.
meanings.sent3: The crystal's piezoelectricities were so strong that it lit up like a tiny light bulb when pressure was applied.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like the piezoelectricities of a crystal, sparking and bright.
meanings.sent5: The piezoelectricities of the crystal were like magic, turning pressure into power.

meanings.definition: The study of materials that exhibit piezoelectric properties.
meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a career in piezoelectricities to understand these unique materials.
meanings.sent2: Piezoelectricities is an interesting field that explores how certain materials generate electricity under pressure.
meanings.sent3: Studying piezoelectricities may sound boring to some, but it's actually quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The world of piezoelectricities is like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: In the realm of science, piezoelectricities shines brightly as a captivating subject.
